Text: Your Hallmark order confirmation WEBDear Shelley Thank you for shopping at Hallmark Heres a recap of your order according to our records Order Number WEB Order Date Total Order Amount Well send another note when the shipment goes out If you need more information click here to use our selfhelp cgibinrightnow or click the Customer Service link on Hallmarkcom If you placed your order on Hallmarkcom and would like to check the status go to Hallmarkcom and click the Order Status link If you are a Hallmarkcom member enter your username and password click on get previous orders and then click the order number If you are not a member first enter the order number and your email address then click order status If you placed your order by phone or would simply prefer to call to check your order status you can call us at Hallmark It will help if you have your order number handy We are open Monday through Friday am pm Saturday am pm and we are closed on Sunday Dont forget to visit Hallmarkcom whenever you need great gifts for everyone on your list Youll find gourmet desserts Hallmark collectibles cards and more And freshcut Hallmark Flowers add beauty to any occasion in any season Be sure to visit us often to see our newest products and special offers Need a great gift at the very last minute Attach a Gift Wish Certificate to an ecard and your recipient can redeem it for gift certificates from over stores restaurants and services Its fast and its easy and its only at Hallmarkcom Sincerely Jody Ellis The Hallmark Team

Hallmark shipment confirmation WEBDear Shelley I just wanted to let you know that your Hallmark order has shipped If you placed this order through wwwHallmarkcom you can check your order status by clicking here hmkWebsitePersonalAreapauploginjsptargetPagePreviousOrders or by clicking Order Status on our homepage If you placed your order by phone or would simply prefer to call to check your order status you can call us at Hallmark It will help if you have this order number handy Order Number WEB SKU ID BSMA Item Description Santa Marta Rosesbr dozen Quantity Shipped Ship Date Carrier CarrierURL NA Tracking Number Please allow hours for the carrier to make tracking information available Click this link or copy it into your browser to view your receipt online receiptsRGoduuqkprlnktfpanskqmoeoglalirvkomykomjkikmmk Thanks again for shopping with us Im glad we could help and hope youll be back soon theres always something new at Hallmark Sincerely Jody Ellis The Hallmark Team
